summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6002 for the improvement of 40th Avenue West from Hooker Street to approximately 285 feet north of West Cramer Street; and certain other streets, avenues and easements, by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 80538, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
